00007 #ifdef RNG_MT
00008 #include "MersenneTwister.h"
00009 class randomnumbergenerator
00010 {
00011         public:
00012                 randomnumbergenerator();
00013                 randomnumbergenerator(luint seed);
00014                 ~randomnumbergenerator() {delete ptr;}
00015                 void write(odump&);
00016                 void read(idump&);
00017                 luint seed() {return my_seed;}
00018                 double d() {return ptr->randDblExc();}                 //in (0,1)
00019                 double d(double supp) {return ptr->randDblExc(supp);}  //in (0,supp)
00020                 int i(int bound) {return ptr->randInt(bound-1);}       //in [0,bound)
00021 
00022         private:
00023                 MTRand* ptr; 
00024                 luint my_seed;
00025 };
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 #ifdef RNG_SPRNG_4
00029 #include "sprng_cpp.h"
00030 class randomnumbergenerator
00031 {
00032         public:
00033                 randomnumbergenerator();
00034                 randomnumbergenerator(luint seed);
00035                 ~randomnumbergenerator() {delete ptr;}
00036                 void write(odump&);
00037                 void read(idump&);
00038                 luint seed() {return my_seed;}
00039                 double d() {return ptr->sprng();}         //in (0,1)
00040                 double d(double supp) {return supp*d();}  //in (0,supp)
00041                 int i(int bound) {return int(bound*d());} //in [0,bound)
00042 
00043         private:
00044                 Sprng * ptr;
00045                 luint my_seed;
00046 };
00047 #endif
